name: Graveyard Farmer
description:
Story

After a year of hard work on the magic farm, you need a break. So you decide to go camping in the peaceful forest. However, this forest is anything but peaceful as you decide to pitch your tent next to a haunted graveyard. Each night the undead roam the forest, looking for easy prey to attack. You must use your magical green fingers to craft powerful spells and keep them at bay!

Gameplay

During the day you can scavenge the surrounding forest for plants. With the seeds from those plants, you can grow magical essence with which you can craft new spells. Each night the undead rise up from the grave and attack your place of rest. When the health of your tent drops to 0, you lose.

Use your shovel to dig spots in the ground to plant seeds in. Your staff functions as the conduit to cast spells. Each new spell can be crafted on the altar by selecting one of the scrolls.

Note

This game was made for the DayKnight 30 day game jam. Even though it is feature complete, it has not been fully playtested and as such probably contains some balance issues and bugs. If you do have any feedback for me, please leave it in the comment section below!
